title: 163: Scouting Combine defensive preview, talking to Myles Garrett’s high school basketball coach
itunes:title: 163: Scouting Combine defensive preview, talking to Myles Garrett’s high school basketball coach
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are in Indianapolis for the 2017 Scouting Combine. In this episode, the duo previews what to look for from the defensive players who will work out at the Scouting Combine. They break down the best defensive linemen, linebackers, cornerbacks and safeties in the class. DJ and Bucky also talk to Texas A&M defensive lineman Myles Garrett’s high school basketball coach Jeff Plemons.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
